en.title: **QA Engineer**
en.info: BC Card Viet Nam · Full-time · On-site · Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
en.text:
Job Description:

  • Analyze customer requirements and find optimal solutions.
  • Test and provide modified versions to customers until acceptance is achieved.
  • Certify EMV contact/contactless with Visa, MasterCard, and JCB.
  • Support customers with all BC Card products (TMS, SG, EDCC, POS App, HSM, NAC/NCC).
  • Prepare documentation such as installation guides and user manuals.
  • Install and operate all services for customers.
  • Conduct product training sessions for clients.
  • Coordinate with software development teams for special case testing.
  • Manage and operate several banking services.
  • Oversee BC Card Vietnam’s data center and network systems.
  • Develop new hardware and software products for BC Card.

Key Achievements:

  • Worked in a professional international environment.
  • Developed Hardware Service Management Application (HSMA) for managing customer service operations.
  • Participated in POS application projects for clients such as SGB, Vietcombank, and Sacombank.
  • Contributed to multiple bank card system projects.

en.title: **QA/QC Engineer**
en.info: TMA Solutions · Full-time · Hybrid · Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
en.text:
Job Description:

  • Wrote test plans, estimated time and resources based on project scope, and defined testing environments.
  • Created and executed detailed test cases.
  • Logged, verified, and tracked bugs until resolution.
  • Led weekly team meetings to review goals and achievements.
  • Reported testing progress and issues to senior management.
